## Intro

Setup R in DCC. See <https://oit-rc.pages.oit.duke.edu/docs/R/RDCC/#background> for details.

```{bash}
mkdir  ~/lab/bl314/rlib
module load R
R
```

After opening R's environment, run:

```{r}
options("repos")
options(repos="https://archive.linux.duke.edu/cran/")
options("repos")
install.packages("lme4", lib="~/lab/bl314/rlib")
install.packages("tidyverse", lib="~/lab/bl314/rlib")
install.packages("lmerTest", lib="~/lab/bl314/rlib")
install.packages("foreach", lib="~/lab/bl314/rlib")
install.packages("pbapply", lib="~/lab/bl314/rlib")
install.packages("doParallel", lib="~/lab/bl314/rlib")
library(lme4,lib.loc="~/lab/bl314/rlib")
q()
```

Test it in bash

```{bash}
ls ~/lab/bl314/rlib/lme4
```
